title: #分享 Joy Division
content:
現在很流行說草東等樂團是厭世風樂團，
對我來說，Joy Division是最早接觸到、也最讓我震撼的「厭世」樂團，
尤其是主唱Ian Curtis短暫、痛苦，兼具傳奇性的一生，
難怪Joy Divison的音樂總帶著憂鬱、焦慮與不安，
看過他的自傳性電影Control後（不是布萊德彼特演的控制），
才能了解何謂真正想厭世、往生的劇烈痛苦，
人生好難，所以偶爾才需要ㄎㄧㄤ一下啊！

不過，Ian Curtis死後他們組了New Order，
就沒有原本那種感覺了，真可惜，
以下是我的愛歌，
是Ian Curtis以自身癲癇症經驗而創作出來的作品。

不知道符不符合板上定義啊，
不符我再刪文。

 Joy Division - Transmission

Radio, live transmission
Radio, live transmission

Listen to the silence, let it ring on
Eyes, dark grey lenses frightened of the sun
We would have a fine time living in the night
Left to blind destruction, waiting for our sight

We would go on as though nothing was wrong
Hide from these days, we remained all alone
Staying in the same place, just staying out the time
Touching from a distance, further all the time

Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio

Well I could call out when the going gets tough
The things that we've learnt are no longer enough
No language, just sound, that's all we need know
To synchronise love to the beat of the show

And we could dance

Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio
Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance, to the radio 

Dance是指他癲癇症發作時的肢體動作，
很自嘲、自虐的一首歌。
